name: Intelligence
tagline: Machine learning library written in javascript for node
body:
#intelligence.js __Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change__ - _Stephen Hawking_
--- ### Overview intelligence.js is a highly modular and extensible machine learning library for node. --- ### Installation `> npm install intelligence` --- ### Testing Running `npm test` will run all tests located in the `/tests` directory. ---
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
